La règle du Coût des jours fériés payés travaillés
result = round(((contract.wage) / (payslip.nb_jours_ouvrable * 8)) * ((worked_days.WORK160 and worked_days.WORK160.number_of_hours) + (worked_days.WORK100 and worked_days.WORK100.number_of_hours)),3)
La règle du salaire de base

result = round(((contract.prime) / (payslip.nb_jours_ouvrable * 8)) * ((worked_days.WORK160 and worked_days.WORK160.number_of_hours) + (worked_days.WORK100 and worked_days.WORK100.number_of_hours) +(worked_days.WORK180 and worked_days.WORK180.number_of_hours)+(worked_days.WORK150 and worked_days.WORK150.number_of_hours)),3)

result= (((worked_days.WORK100 and worked_days.WORK100.number_of_hours) + (worked_days.WORK122 and worked_days.WORK122.number_of_hours) + (worked_days.WORK160 and worked_days.WORK160.number_of_hours))/8)

result =(round((68.181/ (payslip.nb_jours_ouvrable * 8))* ((worked_days.LEAVE140 and worked_days.LEAVE140.number_of_hours) + (worked_days.WORK100 and worked_days.WORK100.number_of_hours)+(worked_days.LEAVE130 and worked_days.LEAVE130.number_of_hours)),3) if (employee.categorie == "Cadre") else round((61.808/ (payslip.nb_jours_ouvrable * 8))* ((worked_days.LEAVE140 and worked_days.LEAVE140.number_of_hours) + (worked_days.WORK100 and worked_days.WORK100.number_of_hours)+(worked_days.LEAVE130 and worked_days.LEAVE130.number_of_hours)),3))
La règle du Indemnité de transport

result = (round((11.643 / (payslip.nb_jours_ouvrable * 8)) * ( (worked_days.LEAVE140 and worked_days.LEAVE140.number_of_hours) + (worked_days.WORK100 and worked_days.WORK100.number_of_hours) +(worked_days.LEAVE130 and worked_days.LEAVE130.number_of_hours)),3))
